tables.title: Haunting Moments
tables.description: Creeping encounters for haunted manors, graveyards, or cursed towns.

entries.result: Footsteps echo from the ceiling while dust falls from unmapped rafters.
A mirror fogs over to reveal writing in a hand you recognize.
Portrait eyes follow the group; one canvas slowly turns to face the wall.
A music box plays without winding, its tune changing tempo with the party's heartbeat.
Fresh flowers appear on a long-abandoned grave.
A chill wind extinguishes lights, revealing footprints that lead nowhere.
A child hums behind a locked door; opening it reveals only silence.
An unseen hand rearranges objects into a warning word.
A whisper offers a bargain if someone steps into the dark cellar alone.
A cracked bell rings once, and nearby insects fall dead instantly.
A shadow lags behind its owner, waving to someone unseen.
A ghostly procession crosses the hall, reenacting the house's last night.

tables.title: Revelations
tables.description: Clues that point to curses, restless spirits, or forgotten crimes.

entries.result: A family tree shows a branch carefully burned away; the missing name appears in blood later.
Diary pages reveal the house was moved from its original foundation overnight.
Local records insist the town never existed on any official map.
An antique key opens every door but also whispers secrets when held to the ear.
The well water briefly runs crimson during each midnight.
Someone replaced church candles with vertebrae carved into spirals.
A sealed room contains a mural predicting the party's arrival in detail.
A ledger lists debts owed to the dead, with one line still blank.

tables.title: Escalating Terrors
tables.description: Raise the stakes when investigators linger too long.

entries.result: A cursed sigil brands itself faintly onto an investigator's skin.
All clocks stop at the same time; each hour afterwards invites a stronger apparition.
Doors refuse to stay open, slamming shut behind the party.
A friendly NPC begins speaking in two voices that argue with one another.
Shadows lengthen, becoming difficult terrain as they clutch at ankles.
The domain seals; escape now requires banishing the spirit or breaking the curse.
